title: Small Garden Tips:  Keep Planting   SD 480p

subtasks: Rip open tarragon seed pods.
Spread tarragon seeds across the soil.
Repeat process with dill seed pods.
Water planted seeds to keep them moist.
Ensure seeds are sown to an eighth-inch depth.
Check on seedlings as they grow.
Soak seeds if necessary to prevent drying.
Cover seeds once planted.
Rip open tarragon seed pods.
Spread tarragon seeds across the soil.
Repeat process with dill seed pods.
Water planted seeds to keep them down.
Ensure seeds are sown to an eighth-inch depth.
Check on seedlings as they grow.
Soak seeds if necessary to prevent drying.
Cover seeds once planted.
